talk.abstract: WebDriver is actually not that complicated. No, really! If you know about Page Objects, synchronization and the JS Executor you can solve just about any problem. 20 minutes is not a lot of time, but we'll cover all three of those things. Honest!

talk.name: A really, really, really, fast tour of WebDriver
